title: Growing older, I have lost the need to be political, which means... the need to be left. I am driven ...
content: 3  /  32   Growing older, I have lost the need to be political, which means... the need to be left. I am driven to grudging toleration of the Conservative Party because it is the party of non-politics, of resistance to politics.	by Kingsley Amis Found in Miscellaneous Quotes, Share to:
contentWithMarkup: Growing older, I have lost the need to be political, which means... the need to be left. I am driven to grudging toleration of the Conservative Party because it is the party of non-politics, of resistance to politics.
